description: This file defines a base class AwsResource for managing AWS resources, including methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting resources, as well as handling AWS region and profile configurations.

classes.name: AwsResource
classes.description: Base class for AWS resources, providing common methods for resource management and AWS configuration handling.

methods.name: get_aws_region
methods.description: Retrieves the AWS region, prioritizing resource attribute, workspace settings, and environment variable.

methods.name: get_aws_profile
methods.description: Retrieves the AWS profile, prioritizing resource attribute, workspace settings, and environment variable.

methods.name: get_service_client
methods.description: Returns the AWS service client, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: get_service_resource
methods.description: Returns the AWS service resource, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: get_aws_client
methods.description: Returns the AWS API client, creating it if not already initialized.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Placeholder method for reading the resource; meant to be overridden.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads the resource from AWS, using cache if enabled.

methods.name: is_active
methods.description: Checks if the resource is active on AWS.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Placeholder method for creating the resource; meant to be overridden.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates the resource on AWS, with caching and post-creation steps.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Hook for post-creation steps, defaulting to no action.

methods.name: _update
methods.description: Placeholder method for updating the resource; meant to be overridden.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the resource on AWS, with post-update steps.

methods.name: post_update
methods.description: Hook for post-update steps, defaulting to no action.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Placeholder method for deleting the resource; meant to be overridden.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the resource from AWS, with post-deletion steps.

methods.name: post_delete
methods.description: Hook for post-deletion steps, defaulting to no action.
